long_description: The Solaris PFD from MTI offers a high-back fit with a low-profile feel that allows you to lean back and relax while paddling around the lake. Durable and lightweight 300-denier polyester shell with closed-cell foam flotation delivers long-lasting service and high performance. Foam is shaped to reduce bulkiness on the front of the PFD. Mesh back and open sides add comfort and free arm movement. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. 2 zippered pockets stash on-the-water essentials. Front-entry clips securely fasten the Solaris around torso and make it easy to get out of the PFD, even with cold hands. Reflective tape increases visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The Solaris PFD from MTI offers a high-back fit with a low-profile feel that allows you to lean back and relax while paddling around the lake.
